title: "Move to" function not working after a "Follow" is used

content.raw:
Hi, 

I am running Gazebo 9.1 and the "Move To" function along with the usual mouse control seems to stop working properly after I use the "Follow" option in one of the robots.
For the "Move To" the robot is not found anymore and is not on frame and for the mouse control, the camera seems to rotate in all degrees of freedom instead of keeping roll fixed.
I recorded a video of this happening. "Follow" seems to still work, though.
Is this issue known already for Gazebo>9.0?
